contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Settlement |name = Jelenia Góra County |native_name=Powiat jeleniogórski |settlement_type=[[Powiat|County]] |image_flag = POL powiat jeleniogórski flag.svg |image_shield = POL powiat jeleniogórski COA.svg |image_map = POL powiat jeleniogórski map.svg |map_caption=Location within the voivodeship |subdivision_type=Country |subdivision_name={{POL}} |subdivision_type1=[[Voivodeships of Poland|Voivodeship]] |subdivision_name1=[[Lower Silesian Voivodeship|Lower Silesian]] |seat = [[Jelenia Góra]] |parts_type = [[Gmina]]s |parts = Total 9 (incl. 4 urban) |p1=[[Karpacz]]|p2=[[Kowary]]|p3=[[Piechowice]]|p4=[[Szklarska Poręba]]|p5=[[Gmina Janowice Wielkie]]|p6=[[Gmina Jeżów Sudecki]]|p7=[[Gmina Myslakowice]]|p8=[[Gmina Podgórzyn]]|p9=[[Gmina Stara Kamienica]]|area_total_km2 = 628.21 |total_type=Total |population_total = 63817 |population_as_of = 2006 |population_density_km2 = auto |population_urban=30475 |population_blank1_title=Rural |population_blank1=33342 |blank_name=[[Polish car number plates|Car plates]] |blank_info=DJE |website=http://www.starostwo.jgora.pl }} __NOTOC__ '''Jelenia Góra County''' ({{lang-pl|powiat jeleniogórski}}) is a unit of territorial administration and local government ([[powiat]]) in [[Lower Silesian Voivodeship]], south-western [[Poland]]. It came into being on January 1, 1999, as a result of the [[Polish local government reforms]] passed in 1998. The county covers an area of {{convert|628.2|km2|sqmi|1}}. Its administrative seat is the city of [[Jelenia Góra]], although this city is not part of the county (it forms a separate city county, which is an [[enclave]] within Jelenia Góra County). There are four towns within the county: [[Karpacz]], [[Szklarska Poręba]], [[Kowary]] and [[Piechowice]]. The first two of these are major [[skiing|ski]] resorts. As at 2006 the total population of the county is 63,817, out of which the population of the towns totals 30,475, and the rural population is 33,342. == Neighbouring counties == Apart from the city of [[Jelenia Góra]], Jelenia Góra County is bordered by [[Lwówek Śląski County]] and [[Złotoryja County]] to the north, and [[Jawor County]] and [[Kamienna Góra County]] to the east. It also borders the [[Czech Republic]] to the south and west. == Administrative division == The county is subdivided into nine [[gmina]]s (four urban and five rural). These are listed in the following table, in descending order of population. {| width="60%" border="2" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" style="font-size:90%;line-height:120%;" |-bgcolor="F0F8FF" | style="text-align:center;"|'''Gmina''' | style="text-align:center;"|'''Type''' | style="text-align:center;"|'''Area<br><small>(km²)</small>''' | style="text-align:center;"|'''Population<br><small>(2006)</small>''' | style="text-align:center;"|'''Seat''' |- |[[Kowary]] |urban | style="text-align:right;"|37.4 | style="text-align:right;"|11,824 |  |- |[[Gmina Mysłakowice]] |rural | style="text-align:right;"|88.8 | style="text-align:right;"|9,990 |[[Mysłakowice]] |- |[[Gmina Podgórzyn]] |rural | style="text-align:right;"|82.5 | style="text-align:right;"|7,833 |[[Podgórzyn, Lower Silesian Voivodeship|Podgórzyn]] |- |[[Szklarska Poręba]] |urban | style="text-align:right;"|75.4 | style="text-align:right;"|7,094 |  |- |[[Piechowice]] |urban | style="text-align:right;"|43.2 | style="text-align:right;"|6,494 |  |- |[[Gmina Jeżów Sudecki]] |rural | style="text-align:right;"|94.4 | style="text-align:right;"|6,303 |[[Jeżów Sudecki]] |- |[[Gmina Stara Kamienica]] |rural | style="text-align:right;"|110.5 | style="text-align:right;"|5,150 |[[Stara Kamienica]] |- |[[Karpacz]] |urban | style="text-align:right;"|38.0 | style="text-align:right;"|5,063 |  |- |[[Gmina Janowice Wielkie]] |rural | style="text-align:right;"|58.1 | style="text-align:right;"|4,066 |[[Janowice Wielkie]] |- |} ==References== *[http://www.stat.gov.pl/gus/45_655_PLK_HTML.htm Polish official population figures 2006] <br> {{Jelenia Góra County}} {{Lower Silesian Voivodeship}} {{coord|50|54|13|N|15|43|58|E|source:itwiki_type:adm2nd|display=title}} [[Category:Jelenia Góra County| ]] [[Category:Land counties of Lower Silesian Voivodeship]]
